title: Work Experience
text:
Work Experience






For the past two years I have been a data analyst for the UCLA Tennis Consulting Organization. I’ve mostly been responsible for the data collection, pre-processing and cleaning stages of tennis matches that is eventually used for analytic reports and dashboards. I most program with Python for the creation of notebooks and Tableau for visualization.





I have been a data assistant for the City of Lancaster since October 2024, providing suggestions and insights on organizational data ranging from handling to analytics.





I interned for the Weld-On R&D Lab for the IPS Corporation.

title: Home
text:
About Me
I am a data scientist with a passion for analytics and statistical modeling.
